newsitem.title: TAIWAN: Taiwan share prices seen consolidating.
newsitem.headline: Taiwan share prices seen consolidating.

text.p: Taiwan share prices are expected to consolidate on Wednesday in mixed market sentiment following recent falls, brokers said.
On Tuesday, the index ended down 110.79 points or 1.37 percent to 7996.75.
Brokers said the market is lacking a clear direction.
"The market appears to agree 7,800 points is a firm support, but the general view on the market's outlook is still quite mixed," said Tsao Chung-ping, an analyst of Ting Kong Securities.
Electronics and financials will likely remain market focus, brokers said.
